turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you make an order at Starbucks online for me to pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks do you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Covington near the transit center

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ah okay I think I know the one that you're talking about. The one on rivercenter street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that's it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll get it. What kind of drink did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking a cinnamon shortbread latte. I'm in a huge cinnamon mood today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. What size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll go with a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want whip cream on that or?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipcream actually. I don't want it to cover up the cinnamon on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I went ahead and placed the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do I get the receipt at the store?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, it's going to be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long is the order going to take?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order will be done shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do I need to pay at the store?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No, since you already have an account.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright! Thank you for ordering for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem!
